quiz.question: Which 1993 video game console from Atari failed commercially and left limited market impact?
Which mail-order video rental startup tried to transform video rental before Blockbuster's decline?
Which beverage experiment from PepsiCo reappeared briefly but ultimately failed to become a permanent product line?
Which subscription music service filed for bankruptcy after competing with Spotify and Apple Music?
Which social network was acquired by Specific Media and Justin Timberlake in 2011?
Which media rental chain's CEO turned down an opportunity to buy Netflix in the early 2000s?
Which Sega console, released in 1999, was discontinued in 2001 and marked Sega's hardware exit?
Which early internet company symbolized speculative excess and collapsed after spending on marketing and logistics?
Which 1980s videotape format lost market dominance despite superior picture quality according to many technologists?
Which smartphone maker once dominated business phones but declined after the iPhone's 2007 launch?
Which failed music device by Microsoft attempted to integrate subscription services into a portable player?
Which 1999 online retailer became emblematic of the dot-com bubble with a famous sock puppet advertising campaign?
Which wearable tech product struggled in the consumer market due to privacy concerns and high price?
Which hardware product did Google end public sales for in 2015 after limited consumer uptake?
Which high-end portable device by Apple in the early 1990s was intended for education and targeted niche markets?
